pages.text: Flux dust is used in many different crafting recipes for the mod. To get started, you must first create a $(l:flux/synthesizer)Synthesizer$(/l), and give it some coal and an ender pearl. Flux dust comes from a mystical quantum ether where energy and items and flow freely...

Use the $(l:flux/synthesizer)Synthesizer$(/l) along with a $(l:io/linker)Linker$(/l) and either diamond or netherite to produce large quantities. Use Eye of Ender and Coal to produce your first Flux Dust (this is gonna take awhile...)
